updates.text: See a comprehensive overview of all events

services.text: Status of Homerunner's services and APIs

countries.text:
Geographical events that may cause problems for shipping in the given country. 
See details on the map

incidents_text:
This page contains a list of Homerunner's live updates. 
They are continuously updated when they are solved.
no_incidents: There are no live updates with the selected filters.
services_text: Here you can see the status of Homerunner's various services
carriers_text: Here you can see the status of Homerunner's various carriers

admin.title: What would you like to create?
admin.resolved_title: When is the problem expected to be resolved?
admin.critical_tooltip: When 'Critical' is selected, the status of the selected carrier/service/country changes to red

modal.confirmation: Are you sure you want to create this live update?
modal.confirmation_carrier: Are you sure you want to create this carrier?

incident.missing_fields: The live update title and description must be completed.
incident.error: An error occurred while creating the live update.

carrier.missing_fields: The carrier's slug and title must be filled in.
carrier.error: An error occurred while creating carrier.

title: Title

400.title: Invalid request
400.description:
There was a problem with the request. 
Please check the information and try again.

401.title: Unauthorized
401.description: You do not have the necessary rights to access this page.

403.title: Forbidden
403.description: You do not have permission to access this resource.

404.title: The page could not be found
404.description:
The requested page does not exist. 
Please check the URL or try to go back to the front page.

405.description: The HTTP method used is not supported for this resource.
405.title: The method is not allowed

500.title: Internal server error
500.description:
An error occurred on the server. 
Try again later.

502.title: Bad gateway
502.description:
The server could not communicate with the required service. 
Try again later.

incident.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this live update?
Are you sure you will mark this live update as resolved?
